# Expedition of Abu Amir Al-Ashari

Note: Book contains a list of battles of Muhammad in Arabic, English translation available [https://web.archive.org/web/20110726142128/http://military.hawarey.org/military_english.htm here]
|place= Autas
|result=Abu Amir Al-Ashari killed
|commander1=Abu Amir Al-Ash'ari  Abu Musa Ash'ari
|commander2=Duraid b. as-Simmah
|strength1= Unknown

The expedition of Abu Amir Al-Ashari, took place in January 630 AD or 8AH, 10th month, of the Islamic Calendar, in Autas.
Expedition
In this expedition, Muhammad dispatched a number of Muslims under the leadership of Abu â€˜Amir Al-Ashari. The Muslims chased the enemy, after which a skirmish took place, and the leader of the platoon, Abu Amir was killed.
Islamic primary sources
